name: HappBee
description:
HappBee Story:

Play as a happy lad, this bee is an odd one as he does not like heights and prefers to stay close to the ground.  The pesky mosquitos have been living near your hive and you want to put a stop to it. Find the mosquito king and put a stop to his madness.

Controls: Control:Action:DescriptionW A S DMoveMoves the player around.Move MouseLookMove the camera around.
SpacebarJumpJump up to higher ground, just not too high.Left MouseAttackUses bee stinger to attack enemies.Right MouseDashDash away or into enemies. Credits:

By: Danyon Huntington

The Care Package Bundle is a collection of seven games, aiming to spread positivity into 2021.
